verses.name: 2 Chronicles 8:16
verses.text: Now all the work of Solomon was prepared unto the day of the foundation of the house of the Lord, and until it was finished. So the house of the Lord was perfected.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 8:17
verses.text: Then went Solomon to Ezion–geber, and to Eloth, at the sea side in the land of Edom.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 8:18
verses.text: And Huram sent him by the hands of his servants ships, and servants that had knowledge of the sea; and they went with the servants of Solomon to Ophir, and took thence four hundred and fifty talents of gold, and brought them to king Solomon.
